content.raw: @PhyNerd You may want to take a look at [BLACS issue #13](#!/labscript_suite/blacs/issues/13/launch-blacs-as-a-secondary-control-system) which I've just updated with a proposed syntax that is consistent between the various different "remote" features that have been requested. Chris previously gave his general agreement to that syntax. If you were also happy with it, I might make a pull request with that code in and we can maybe get the ball rolling a bit on this before Chris comes back.
